_source: Presets calibrated to Ohio Stadium (102,780 cap). Attendance ranges reflect REAL 2024 avg of 104,944. Student ratio range 0.16-0.26 reflects ESTIMATED student section (20,800 seats = ~20% at capacity).

presets.name: Max Atmosphere
presets.description: Maximize crowd energy and student presence for ultimate home field advantage

presets.name: Revenue Focus
presets.description: Optimize concessions and premium seating for maximum revenue

presets.name: Balanced
presets.description: Balance atmosphere, operations, and revenue for optimal game day

presets.name: Conservative
presets.description: Minimize operational risk with comfortable staffing levels

presets.name: Student Rush
presets.description: Pack the student section — 20,800 seats at full show rate plus standing room

presets.name: Ops Safe
presets.description: Ensure smooth operations with no queue overloads — all stands open, max staff
